attributes.action: Make an additional bank holiday for the 15th of November
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In this country it is a well known fact that there are fewer public holidays than in others.

From the Summer Bank Holiday we have to wait 4 months until the next so I propose a new Bank Holiday for the 15th of November.

On this day several key moments have passed in British history, the Anglo-Irish Agreement was signed, Sean Bishop was born, the Queen Elizabeth docks at Southampton for the last time and The British chisel was perfected.

Giving us this extra day will make for a better United Kingdom, a fresher having had a day off United Kingdom and a happy United Kingdom.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
